original_text: Jacob looked up. He saw Esau with 400 men coming towards him. So he separated his children into groups. Some went with Leah, some went with Rachel, and some went with his two female servants.
korean_text: 야곱이 눈을 들어 보니 에서가 사백 명의 장정을 거느리고 오고 있는지라 그의 자식들을 나누어 레아와 라헬과 두 여종에게 맡기고

sentences.original_text: So he separated his children into groups
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 자기 아이들을 무리로 나누었다

sentences.original_text: and some went with his two female servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 일부는 그의 두 여종과 함께 갔다
